title: Probab Combinatorics
description: Applications of probabilistic techniques in discrete mathematics, including classical ideas using expectation and variance as well as modern tools, such as martingale and correlation inequalities.

prerequisites: MATH 4022 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MATH 6221 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
